submodules.title: On-chain Treasury System
submodules.description: A decentralized treasury that allows members to pool funds securely on the blockchain, ensuring transparency and traceability of all transactions.

submodules.title: Staking Mechanism
submodules.description: Enables proposal submitters to stake an amount equal to or greater than the requested funds, ensuring accountability and reducing the risk of misuse.

submodules.title: Proposal-Based Funding
submodules.description: A structured process where community members can submit funding proposals that are voted on by the community, fostering democratic decision-making.

submodules.title: Slashing Mechanism
submodules.description: A safety feature that penalizes misuse of funds by returning the staked amount to the treasury if a proposal is reported and deemed misused.

submodules.title: Community Voting System
submodules.description: A secure and transparent voting mechanism that allows members to vote on funding proposals, ensuring that all voices are heard in the decision-making process.

submodules.title: Role-Based Permissions
submodules.description: Utilizes verified identities to assign roles and permissions, ensuring that only authorized members can submit proposals or vote, enhancing security and trust.

submodules.title: On-Chain Identity Verification
submodules.description: Integrates with Self Protocol to verify user identities on-chain, ensuring that all participants are legitimate and reducing the risk of fraud.

submodules.title: Verified User Profiles
submodules.description: Maintains a database of verified users, allowing for trust and accountability within the community, as only verified members can submit proposals.

submodules.title: GitHub Integration
submodules.description: Facilitates collaboration by linking project repositories, allowing community members to track project progress and contribute to discussions directly from GitHub.

submodules.title: Discord Integration
submodules.description: Enhances community engagement by integrating with Discord, providing real-time updates on proposals, voting, and treasury status, fostering a collaborative environment.

submodules.title: Real-Time Dashboard
submodules.description: A user-friendly interface that visualizes proposals, fund flow, and voting statistics, allowing members to easily track the status of community initiatives.

submodules.title: Modular Structure
submodules.description: Designed to accommodate various types of organizations, including DAOs, NGOs, and grant committees, providing flexibility in how funds are managed and allocated.
